description: Tousana John was a teacher at Tamuyuan Academy, a school only the wealthiest can attend. At that time, he became the reverend of the teachers. He got expelled from the academy after http://anidb.net/ch93824 [Takaran], the bureaucrat, accused him for not believing http://anidb.net/ch93826 [his son] who in return attempted suicide.
name: Tousana John
